sheep.graphics
Class Font

java.lang.Object
  android.graphics.Paint
      sheep.graphics.Font

public class Font
extends android.graphics.Paint

This class exists primarily as a convenience when drawing text. It predefines a few static Paint objects with suitable attributes.

Constructor Detail

Font

public Font(int r,
            int g,
            int b,
            float size,
            android.graphics.Typeface family,
            int style)
Creates a new Font with the specified color, size and style.

Parameters:
r - Red component (0-255).
g - Green component (0-255).
b - Blue component (0-255).
size - The size of the font face.
family - For instance Typeface.SANS_SERIF.
style - For instance Typeface.BOLD.
